abstract: Ho Ching will step down as chief executive of the Singaporean state investor Temasek Holdings at a time when turmoil in global markets is ravaging the value of its investments.
lead_paragraph: Ho Ching will step down as chief executive of the Singaporean state investor Temasek Holdings at a time when turmoil in global markets is ravaging the value of its investments.

headline.main: Former BHP Chief to Replace Head of Temasek
